messages.content:
Subject: Invitation to discuss Ethical AI on *Tech Tomorrow*

Hi Dr. Patel,

I’m Jordan Lee, host of *Tech Tomorrow*, a podcast that dives deep into the cutting‑edge of technology and its societal impact. Your pioneering work on AI fairness and ethics has been a major inspiration for our listeners, especially after our recent episode "The Future of AI Ethics" which saw a 15% higher completion rate.

We’re planning an upcoming episode titled **"The Future of Ethical AI: From Theory to Practice"** and would be thrilled to feature you as our guest. Your insights on translating AI ethics research into real‑world applications would resonate strongly with our audience, who are eager for concrete, responsible‑AI guidance.

The recording typically takes about 45 minutes and can be scheduled at your convenience. We’d love to accommodate any preferred dates/times you have.

Thank you for considering this invitation. I look forward to the possibility of showcasing your expertise on *Tech Tomorrow*.

Best regards,
Jordan Lee
Host, *Tech Tomorrow*
Email: jordan@techtomorrow.com
Twitter: @JordanTechTalk
